data.message: When will you let the caffeine free ranges have flavours though? Love to see that!

replies.message: Hi Becky, thanks for getting in touch. You can find different flavours of Caffeine Free Diet Coke at our Coca-Cola Freestyle machines:)
Which are where? I have never seen q freestyle machine in my life. I come from the south West of England. Would love to try the flavours but cannot have caffeine.
And what flavours are available, maybe I can search them online to buy some?

Hi Becky, you can find our Coca-Cola Freestyle machines in a few locations, including Burger King and Five Guys. You can find your nearest one as well as all available flavours over at www.coca-colafreestyle.co.uk. Hope this helps :)
Coca cola people want to be able to walk into a ordinary shop to buy it not burger king or five guys

Ah thank you Andy, that would be lovely but us non caffeine drinkers are too wierd and abnormal for that! Can't even buy plain caffeine free from most shops in England only big superstores! Never in any restaurants etc so have to go for Lemonade or soda water!
Coca-Cola ur like an mp. Just say that it's not profitable lol
